Please SAVE YOUR MONEY! I wished I‚Äôve listen to the  negative reviews. I m not one to give bad reviews and I am telling nothing but the true. The hair tangles a lot  and looks nothing like human hair. I ve only had it for two weeks. When I got in touch with the vendor they said  and I Quote.
‚Äú We sell this hair in pounds and pounds to hundreds of clients all over the world.
And we have no complaints.‚Äù
Looking  at the reviews below, I see that I m not the only one who had a negative experience with this hair. If no one complained, what are these negative review? They continue to say that it‚Äôs because synthetic was added at the roots that it tangles. The synthetic  hair was not mixed with the human hair, the was I did my hair is the same and exact way someone else did, this post is on YouTube. they also mentioned that it was my hair dresser‚Äôs fault for not knowing how to style and work with the hair.To my followers, I will be making a full review on YouTube.  I M NOT judging the people who work for this company, because I don‚Äôt know them. I am only judging the quality of the hair I ve purchased. So Stay Tuned!

originalText.text:
Place an order ATLEAST 4 weeks in advance of your appt. The negative reviews due to back log of shipments is sad. Because the customer service is beyond great. Amazing customer service from Peter! Due to the recent viral positive videos about the hair, you can expect that they have a lot of orders. Be patient. Can‚Äôt wait to receive my hair!

Update: 1.) I received my hair and had it installed!! I am SO IN LOVE. Definitely requires a different instal method than the synthetic/feed in method you may be used too. Gelling the tips of hair and sticking it in will cause it to shed/ fall out.  I had my hair done twice with both methods and the normal feed in method will CAUSE SHEDDING. You need to WEAVE the human hair into the braids just as you would the synthetic braiding hair. That will give you a flawless install.
2.) I was sent twice the amount of hair, because originally I ordered the wrong curl pattern . I canceled my second order and informed them and they were very understanding. When I went on vacation and arrived back home the second order was waiting for me / and my card was charged . I understand due to recent viral videos that they are busy with orders, and servicing influencers, but as for me I saved up all my Pennies to buy the most flawless human hair for these braids. I was on a hunt for over a year. And I was told I couldn‚Äôt return unused hair or get a refund- not a big issue as I just decided to install all bundles for a full human hair look. But next time please don‚Äôt tell me my order is cancelled and will be refunded, but then it‚Äôs sent out two weeks later. Taking off a star for customer service as it could be better- But again- this hair is amazing.

originalText.text:
PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!  This hair is garbage. $300 for the hair and $375 to install for my birthday celebration.  I have to wear wigs until I can take it down.

Ruined clothing from the black dye dripping from the hair.  Hair and hair color do not match the website description.  The worst extensions that I have EVER purchased!

I wrote a more detailed review but it got accidentally deleted when I tried to add photos.

originalText.text: Lugo‚Äôs Hair is amazing! This is my spotüíÅüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I‚Äôve been a customer for years and they helped me feel so confident with my protective hairstyles during my college years as a student- athlete who was always on the go and also a post graduate starting my career journey. People always compliment my hair, saying how natural it looks and blends with my hair. The customer service was and is always top notch. They love what they do and it shows in every aspect of their business, from the hair quality to the joy of the employees. As a celebrity publicist, talent manager, and content creator, I refer all my talent and hair stylists here too for photoshoots, videoshoots, and movies/film. Love them so much!üíñ

originalText.text: Lugos hair is wonderful! The luxurious feel and natural appearance make them worth every penny. The staff's expertise helped me choose the perfect match for my hair type. I feel like a whole new person with these extensions!
